resources.string:
Focus Lock monitors which apps you use and automatically closes distracting apps (like Instagram and YouTube) after 20 seconds.

 This service is essential for Focus Lock to work. It does not collect or share any data.

 Required permissions:
 • Monitor app usage
 • Perform gestures (to go to home screen)
 • Observe your actions (to detect app changes)
Focus Lock uses Device Admin to prevent easy uninstallation during weak moments. This is the "nuclear option" that makes the app harder to bypass.
